item.title: Doom documents
item.description: Fundemental Key bind Navigate window : SPC-f- Find file : SPC-SPC or SPC-p- Help anything : SPC-h- Getting started with Doom Emacs â€” A great transition from Vim to Emacs | by Aria Edmonds | Medium evil Jump to specific line evil-easymotion: g-s-j search words : s- comment something: gc comment paragraoh: gcgsj and select comment this line: Vjjgc delete indentation : dii delete indentation plus the line above : dik delete indentation plus the line abobe and below The niceties of evil in Doom Emacs | by Aria Edmonds | Medium
